column4: Hi. can someone help me please. I am running Ubuntu 10.04 on a Sony Viao laptop and for some reason I cannot adjust the brigntness when on battery which means my battery dies really quickly. I usually FN F5 & F6 dim and brighten the screen but I can't seem to find any way. Also in the power settings I have the option to set the brightness for when the computer is plugged in but the option is not there for battery power.
which Viao model specifically do you have?
It's a Viao NW something I think

I think it might be an ATI driver issue.  There's not too many solutions I can find, but maybe some in this thread will help? http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1466208  Also, you didn't give me a full model number, so that link is more of a guess.
